title: saaramyna
sahitya:
sAramaina mATalanda cAlu cAlu rA

       



anupallavi



sArasAkSa mImentO santOSamu mElu

       



caraNam 1



 sOmuDu daya mAyanEmi sudatiki mahA bhAgya mAyanE kAmakOTi

sundara mA bhAgya miTulAyanE

       



caraNam 2



 manavi vinara sAmi ninnu nammiyunnAnu marEmi ghanuDaina

shESuNivai velayu shrI padmanAbha
